mapper.select: select u.name, u.description, u.head, count(p.user_id) n from Product p,User u where p.user_id = u.id group by p.user_id order by n desc limit 5;
mapper.update: update User set name = #{name}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, head = #{head}, address = #{address}, gender = #{gender}, website = #{website}, description = #{description} where id = #{id}
